text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Service contract" means a procurement contract for services that:
will be provided to a unit in the Executive Branch of State government;
will be performed within a State-operated facility; and
in the estimation of the procurement officer, will exceed an annual cost of $100,000.
"Services" has the meaning stated in § 11-101 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
"Unit" has the meaning stated in § 11-101 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
